entry.def: If two or more things are related, there is a connection between them.

example.ex: The philosophical problems of chance and of free will are closely related.
example.tran: 或然性和自由意志这两个哲学问题是紧密相关的。

example.ex: ...equipment and accessories for diving and related activities.
example.tran: 潜水及相关活动所需的装备和配件

entry.tran: 有亲属关系的;属同一家族的
entry.def: People who are related belong to the same family.

example.ex: ...people in countries like Bangladesh who have been able to show they are related to a spouse or parent living in Britain.
example.tran: 能够证明自己和生活在英国的配偶或父母有亲属关系的孟加拉国等国家的公民

entry.tran: (动物)有亲缘关系的;(语言)同源的
entry.def: If you say that different types of animal or different languages are related, you mean that they have developed from the same type of animal or language.

example.ex: Sanskrit is related very closely to Latin, Greek, and the Germanic and Celtic languages.
example.tran: 梵语和拉丁语、希腊语、日耳曼和凯尔特语是联系密切的同源语言。

means.word_mean: 与…有亲戚关系的， 属同一家族的；

sentences.en: He claims to be distantly related to the British royal family.
sentences.cn: 他声称自己与英国王室是远亲。

sentences.en: A family tree is a diagram with branches,showing how the members of a family are descended and related.
sentences.cn: 家谱是说明家族成员血缘承袭关系的明细分支图。

sentences.en: All the bees in the colony are genetically related.
sentences.cn: 同一群体的蜜蜂都有亲缘关系。

sentences.en: The related publications are far too numerous to list individually.
sentences.cn: 相关出版物太多，没法一一列举。

sentences.en: We spent days going through all related reference material.
sentences.cn: 我们花了好多天功夫查阅所有有关的参考资料。

sentences.en: The two ideas are very closely related.
The occurrence of the disease is apparently related to standards of hygiene.
sentences.cn: 这种病的发生率显然与卫生状况相关。

sentences.en: The unemployment figures are not necessarily related to the rise in prices.
sentences.cn: 失业的数目同物价的上涨并没有必然的联系。
